org.safs

Class ComponentFunction.Window

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.safs.ComponentFunction.Window
  • Enclosing class:
    ComponentFunction

    public static class ComponentFunction.Window
extends java.lang.Object
    An inner class to encapsulate a window information for adjusting window size, position etc.
    It includes also some static methods to restore, maximize, minimize or close current focused window.
    These methods may only work on Windows system, it uses java Robot to trriger shortcut menu.
